summary: PROBLEMS WITH VEHICLE'S STEERING COLUMN.  *MR  THE CONSUMER ALWAYS NOTICED A SLACK OR A LOOSENESS IN THE STEERING .  THE VEHICLE ALSO  DEVELOPED A NOISE.  THE INPUT SHAFT SEAL WAS DRIED AT THE RACK AND PINION AND THE DUST COVER WAS REMOVED TO THE INPUT SHAFT AND THE SEAL WAS PULLED BACK.  *SCC   *JB
